Articles.Content: Hi I just bought the expansion pack Breaking Ground and I am not sure how to enable the alligator hinges on my Xbox or any of the other robotic parts. Can you give me a hand? I have been trying to figure it out for a while.

On 4/2/2022 at 1:47 AM, Thedogg134 said:

Hi I just bought the expansion pack Breaking Ground and I am not sure how to enable the alligator hinges on my Xbox or any of the other robotic parts. Can you give me a hand? I have been trying to figure it out for a while.

You have to select the part and then move the sliders, make sure the motors are on etc.
